components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Orange in France via a Subset of Longcodes

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages to Orange in France via a Subset of Long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures when sending messages to Orange in France via a Subset of Long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures from multiple networks to a Subset of Twilios Phone Numbers in Israel

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures from multiple networks to a subset of Twilios phone numbers in Israel. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery to a Subset of Phone Numbers in Israel.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: This incident causing Inbound SMS Delivery Failures to a Subset of Phone Numbers in Israel was prematurely resolved in one of our previous posts. Please refer to https://status.twilio.com/incidents/yhmfq38hfz2v for previous updates. We are observing successful SMS delivery to a Subset of Phone Numbers in Israel.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - T-Mobile NL

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner T-Mobile NL Netherlands is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 November 2025 at 14:00 PST until 14 November 2025 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for T-Mobile NL Netherlands customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned maintenance in US & Canada between 19:00 and 20:00 Pacific Time on 11/18/2025. During the maintenance window, LOA (Letters of Authorization) will be delayed. We recommend users not to create or update hosted and ported numbers in that window, but if they do, they can retry if they experience any errors.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 10 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
12 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
17 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 17 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
24 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 24 November 2025 at 16:00 PST
26 November 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
